titles.title: We see the Lord, we see the Lord,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We see the Lord, we see the Lord,
He is high and lifted up
And His train fills the temple, (x2)
The angels cry "Holy",
The angels cry "Holy",
The angels cry "Holy is the Lord."

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We see the Lord, we see the Lord,
He is standing in our midst
And His glory shines around us, (x2)
Sing, "Glory hallelujah",
Sing, "Glory hallelujah",
Sing, "Glory hallelujah,praise the Lord".
